buildCommand: pip install -r requirements.txt && echo 'Running Migrations' && python manage.py migrate && echo 'Creating Superuser' && python manage.py shell -c "from django.contrib.auth.models import User; User.objects.filter(username='$DJANGO_SUPERUSER_USERNAME').exists() or User.objects.create_superuser('$DJANGO_SUPERUSER_USERNAME', '$DJANGO_SUPERUSER_EMAIL', '$DJANGO_SUPERUSER_PASSWORD')" && echo 'Superuser Created'
